name: Confirm if Waterproofing Contractors ITP’s have been received and confirms substrate is ready to receive tiles.
Visual Inspection shows that membrane has no signs of obvious surface damage.
Ensure pedestal + pavers align at specified FFL
Pedestals do not show any signs of rocking or lateral movement.
Spacers do not extrude past the finished paver height.
Confirm that pavers follow the required fall or level as specified
Confirm area of work is accessible & acceptable to commence (If not comment below)
Confirm all falls to drain shower are minimum 1:80
Confirm all falls to drain in wet area are minimum 1:100
Check finish floor level is at meter mark
Confirm floor wastes are free of debris at tiling completion
Confirm area of work is accessible & acceptable to commence (If not comment below)
Confirm all wall tiles are trowelled and not spot fixed
Check wall tiles are plumb and straight at tiling completion
